entry.title: GoPro: The Weather Machine - Back O'er Oregon
entry.content:
Musician Slater Smith of The Weather Machine travels to all of Oregon's 185 state parks to record his single "Back O'er Oregon".
For more on The Weather Machine check out: http://weathermachinemusic.com http://facebook.com/weathermachinemusic Twitter: @WeatherMachine
Shot 100% on the HD HERO3+® camera from ‪http://GoPro.com.
Get stoked and subscribe: http://goo.gl/HgVXpQ
Music The Weather Machine "Back O'er Oregon"
